title: Skarner Broken
body:
wow this patch made this game pre much tank meta over again thx rito for good balancing this patch was bad skarner is ridiculous.... he was fine the way b4

GG hes 60%+ winrate right now good job.

replies.body: Yeah he's way overtuned, but you better get comfortable with him because it seems like there's going to be no nerfs to him next patch either.

Holy crap i just watched Saint Vicious play Skarner and said to myself 'that shi*t is OP asf' then went on LolKing and saw Skarner had a 60.86% win rate... that's no joke it's extremely rare for a champion to get a win rate above 55% let alone 60%... didn't think those changes would have such a huge impact >.>

his passive are the pillars which make contest dragon and baron a bitch

I'm sorry, I now realize that after reading his abilities properly, his passive isn't totally at waste.

I judged before I used him, he is actually 2 stronk. His passive crystals are still useless when in enemy jg, but they do help on solo dragon early, and he actually synergizes with new items really well.
